Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui
Classes that implement the graphical user interface of the client of the Masters of Renaissance game.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BuyDevelopmentCardController
    Gui controller class of the development card purchase action.
    EndgameController
    Gui controller used on game end, which shows who won, and the leaderboars.
    Gui
    JavaFX App
    GuiController
     
    InputNicknameController
    Gui controller that manages the input of a nickname.
    MainMenuController
    Gui controller that manages the main menu.
    MainOptionsController
     
    PlayOnlineController
    Gui controller used to prompt a destination server, and open a connection with it.
    SetupLeadersController
    Gui controller used for the leader cards setup scene.
    SetupResourcesController
    Gui controller used for the resources setup scene.
    TakeFromMarketController
    Gui controller class of the take Market resources action.
    TriggerActionTokenController
    Gui controller used on Solo game turn switch, which displays the activated action token.
    TurnAfterActionController
    Gui controller used when the local player is current player, and has already chosen a base turn action.
    TurnBeforeActionController
    Gui controller used when the local player is current player, and hasn't chosen a base turn action.
    TurnController
    Gui abstract controller for the main turn scenes, which will show the playerboard of the current player and the available actions, depending on the turn phase.
    WaitingBeforeGameController
    Gui controller used when waiting for a game after joining a lobby, or to prepare a new game.
    WaitingForTurnController
    Gui controller used when local player is not the current player.
